info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued June 29 at 7:27PM MDT until June 29 at 10:00PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 PM MDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HARDING COUNTY... At 726 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 8 miles southwest of Ladner, or 21 miles northwest of Buffalo, moving northeast at 20 mph. Hail over quarter sized is being observed 9 miles west- southwest of Ladner. HAZARD...Golf ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Ladner, North Cave Hills, Table Mountain and South Cave Hills. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: This storm is producing large hail. SEEK SHELTER NOW inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
